model.label: BSM BLOB data
model.description: A model for exposing binary data (BLOB, binary large object)
model.notes: This model is used for exposing BLOB (binary large objects) data which could not be provided by repeating blocks of other models.

point.label: BLOB Type
point.description: Which BLOB data gets provided by this model instance

symbol.label: Communication Module Firmware Hash
symbol.description: This model instance provides the communication module's firmware hash (SHA-256)

point.label: Number Of BLOB Registers
point.description: The number of registers of the BLOB data area
point.notes: This is the space actually reserved in B. The BLOB data's actual length is given in bytes by BB.

point.label: Number Of BLOB Bytes
point.description: The number of registers comprising the BLOB data

point.label: BLOB data
point.notes: The BLOB data covers all registers from its block.
